public abstract class MoveSubsite
extends DocumentUsecase

Usecase to move a subsite to another area.

getObjectsToLock

protected Transactionable[] getObjectsToLock()
                                      throws UsecaseException
Lock the following objects:
  • all involved documents in the document's area
  • the trash versions of these documents
  • the document area's site structure
  • the trash site structure

Overrides:
getObjectsToLock in class AbstractUsecase
Returns:
The objects that could be changed during the usecase.
Throws:
UsecaseException - if an error occurs.
See Also:
